price: Anaasε moho atͻ mo sε Nea Ɔwͻ soro no mma mframa den bi mmͻ mo (sεdeε εbͻͻ Aadfoͻ no)? (Ԑhͻ na) mobehunu sεdeε Me kͻkͻbͻ (akyiri asεm) siteε.
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
